B

BasicData - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.view.data
The default type of a player client side, it extends PlayerData and it's the player without any ClientLeaderCard played.
BasicData(String, LineClient) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.view.data.BasicData
Instantiates a new BasicData setting his nickname and his reference to the server.
BasicDevSpace - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board
The type of the Basic Development Space where every player has their Basic Production Power.
BasicDevSpace(Board) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board.BasicDevSpace
Instantiates a new Basic Development Space adding the references of the board where it belongs.
BasicPlayer - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
The type Basic player (it extends Player) It's the player without any LeaderCard.
BasicPlayer(String) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player.BasicPlayer
Instantiates a new Basic player.
BasicPlayer(String, ClientHandler) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player.BasicPlayer
Instantiates a new Basic player.
BLUE - it.polimi.ingsw.model.Colors
 
Board - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board
The player's Board with the references to player's WareHouse, StrongBox, Slot, FaithPath and BasicDevSpace
Board(Player) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board.Board
Instantiates a new Board for the Player building the objects it needs: WareHouse, StrongBox, Slot, FaithPath, BasicDevSpace and TempBox.
BUY_DEV_CARD - it.polimi.ingsw.controller.TurnState
 
buyDev(String, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Table.Table
Called when a Player needs to buy a DevCard knowing color and level parameters: removes it from the table updating the stack.
BuyDevRequest - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Request
The Request sent by a player when he wants to buy a DevCard.
BuyDevRequest(int, String, String, ArrayList<MappedResource>, int) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Request.BuyDevRequest
Instantiates a new BuyDevRequest setting the information for handle the specific actions: the Game's ID, the player's nickname, the DevCard'ID the player wants to buy, all the MappedResource needed to buy the card and the number of the slot in which the player wants to put the card.
BuyDevSelection - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.view.selections
The Selection that guides the player when he chose to buy a development card.
BuyDevSelection() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.view.selections.BuyDevSelection
 
BuyDevUpdate - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Updates
The Update sent after that a Player buys a DevCard.
BuyDevUpdate(String, ArrayList<TurnState>, ArrayList<Resource[]>, ArrayList<Resource>, ArrayList<String>, int, ArrayList<String>) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.Updates.BuyDevUpdate
Instantiates a new BuyDevUpdate setting everything can change with this actions: the TurnState list, Player's warehouse, Player's strongbox, Player's victory points and the development card on the table.
